attributes.review: You know I opened this app with a lot of expectations but thatâ€™s the funny thing isnâ€™t it. People donâ€™t live up to expectations, like my ex boyfriend Kyle. I expected him to punch 3 holes in the wall per day but he could only do 2. Being disappointed is a part of life. Like when i ordered a venti upside down carmel macchiato with light ice and 6 pumps of vanilla and 6 pumps of caramel but they only gave me a grande. To say I was disappointed would be an understatement. I donâ€™t think my life has been the same since. To make a short story long, this app and president are a normal grande caramel macchiato and I am not having it today.
attributes.title: Expectations

attributes.review: So I came on here to see the plans for the election however whenever you open the app it makes your phone connect a Bluetooth speaker and plays the b-word lasagna by pewdiepie and then if you exit the app it makes a big car filled with Martha the dog plushes come and surround your house with them itâ€™s terrifying, it makes my phone glitch and itâ€™s scary and my five year old is crying from all the Martha the talking dogs and the oompah loompahs come to your house and breaks your windows and steals your legos my poor Jamison is crying because he just wants his legos this is such an awful app 10/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: Oh dear

attributes.review: I decided to download the app with high expectations, but was soon angered by the long download time. It took a total of 32 hours and 7 minutes for the app to download, and when I opened the app I was even more angered. The structure of the app is horrendous and is very confusing. I know that I should not have had such high expectations, considering that it was not made by the person we all worship, Donal Trump. But I was expecting better, you know the man, constantly talking about his high IQ. I assumed that he was not so stupid, but I guess in this case I should have judged a book by its cover.
attributes.title: takes too long to download

attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!â€¦ Start.

And next time, don't mess with gen z. Tiktok is our only source of happiness and you're trying to ban it because you're mad about your little rally. attributes.review: Iâ€™m not writing this review because Iâ€™m not a fan of Trump which I am not. I only downloaded to be on top of everything going on. I have an brand new iPhone 11 and I started to realize that my battery power was decreasing far more rapidly than normal. I thought it may be because I had to many apps open so I went to settings and turned on low power mode but it still decreased fast which is bizarre. Not only to mention it took up way too much storage. Just do your phone a favor and watch the news instead
